sentences.en: "I'm not altogether a fool," she said gruffly.
sentences.cn: “我还不太傻，”她生硬地说。

sentences.en: "Perhaps it would be better if I withdrew altogether." — "Certainly not!"
sentences.cn: “也许，我完全退出更好吧。”——“当然不是！”

sentences.en: A growing number of employers are trying to bypass the unions altogether.
sentences.cn: 越来越多的雇主试图完全绕过工会行事。

sentences.en: Altogether seven inmates escaped by scaling a wall and climbing down scaffolding.
sentences.cn: 总共有7名犯人攀墙从脚手架上爬下来逃走了。

sentences.en: Altogether, it was a delightful town garden, peaceful and secluded.
sentences.cn: 总体上说，这是个令人愉快的城市花园，宁静而偏僻。

sentences.en: an old custom that has vanished altogether
sentences.cn: 一个彻底消亡的古老习俗

sentences.en: Congress could ban the procession altogether.
sentences.cn: 国会可以完全禁止这次游行。

sentences.en: His objective was to kill the space station project altogether.
sentences.cn: 他的目的是使空间站项目全面停止。

sentences.en: How much do I owe you altogether?
sentences.cn: 我总共欠你多少钱？

sentences.en: I don't think a sedentary life would altogether suit me.
sentences.cn: 我认为长期伏案的生活一点也不适合我。

sentences.en: It was altogether owing it to himself that James won the prize.
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯获奖完全是靠自己的努力.

sentences.en: Lots of sunshine, wonderful food, and amazing nightlife – altogether a great vacation!
sentences.cn: 充沛的阳光，可口的食物，美妙的夜生活——总而言之，这是个完美的假期！

sentences.en: My involvement has not been altogether, shall we say, ethical.
sentences.cn: 可以说，我的参与还不是完全合乎道德。

sentences.en: she's agreed to pose in the altogether.
sentences.cn: 她同意摆裸体姿态。

sentences.en: That is another matter altogether. And we shall come to that next.
sentences.cn: 那完全是另一回事，接下来我们会谈到。

sentences.en: The long-range goal must be to do away with nuclear weapons altogether.
sentences.cn: 远期目标必须是将核武器尽数销毁。

sentences.en: The train went slower and slower until it stopped altogether.
sentences.cn: 火车愈来愈慢，最后完全停了。

sentences.en: There were five people altogether.
sentences.cn: 总共有五个人。

sentences.en: We were not altogether sure that the comet would miss the Earth.
sentences.cn: 我们不能完全肯定彗星不会与地球相撞。

sentences.en: Well, now just a second, I don't altogether agree with the premise.
sentences.cn: 嗯，且慢，我并不完全同意这个前提。

sentences.en: When Artie stopped calling altogether, Julie found a new man.
sentences.cn: 当阿蒂彻底不再上门后，朱莉又找了个男人。

trans.tran_cn: 总共，总而言之，（用以强调）完全，全部
trans.tran_en: used to emphasize that something has been done completely or has finished completely
not wearing any clothes – used humorously
